title: Summoner Icon - Not Same/Sync Here
body:
Summoner icon in game is the green snake. Why is it showing a different icon here? It's not a huge deal - just curious.

Thanks-

replies.body: Sometimes it can take a day or two to update.  I did manually re-sync the accounts though just to be sure.  Based on the change in Summoner Name, I'm assuming it worked, but let me know if it's still off.

Mine was out of since ever since end of Draven day. 

I'm back to my TF icon for a lonnngggg time in game now.

Tried relogging, resetting the icons. Use a different browser, nothing works. It does bother me, as everyone alot of other people use Draven Icons.

The name did change which is great. I have had the same summoner icon for a few weeks - it still isn't correct. It should be the green snake icon.

Thanks for your help - it's appreciated.

> [{quoted}](name=Clickster,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=O9tkqjfK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-12T22:26:42.276+0000)
>
> The name did change which is great. I have had the same summoner icon for a few weeks - it still isn't correct. It should be the green snake icon.
> 
> Thanks for your help - it's appreciated.

There's currently an issue with the API for the Summoner Icons, so those aren't being pushed out to websites like the Boards. Just wanted to let you know that this isn't something that's intended or can be fixed right now :P Sorry about that!

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=O9tkqjfK,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-05-12T23:28:17.039+0000)
>
> There's currently an issue with the API for the Summoner Icons, so those aren't being pushed out to websites like the Boards. Just wanted to let you know that this isn't something that's intended or can be fixed right now :P Sorry about that!

Appreciate the response. Thanks!

I noticed this as well. Something happened on Draven day and Riot needs to fix it.

I've changed my icon several times, but it's still stuck on the cat one on the boards. Everywhere else it updates.

I know this is related to Draven day. I understand it is not the most urgent issue currently, but I would like to see it fixed sometime soon if they can spare the time.
